mapper.select: select rownum n, b.board_num, title, content, bdate, views, board_type_num, m.member_num, m.MEMBER_NICK from board b, MEMBER m, deal d WHERE b.MEMBER_NUM = m.MEMBER_NUM and d.board_num = b.board_num order by board_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into board(board_num,title,content,bdate,views,board_type_num,member_num) values((select nvl(max(board_num), 0)+1 from board), #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, 0, 33, 1)
insert into deal(deal_num,deal_price,board_num) values((select nvl(max(deal_num), 0)+1 from deal),#{deal_price},(select nvl(max(board_num), 0) from board))
insert into picture(picture_file_num, picture_fname, board_num) values((select nvl(max(picture_file_num), 0)+1 from picture),#{picture_fname},(select nvl(max(board_num), 0) from board))
mapper.select: select * from deal d, board b where d.board_num = b.board_num and b.board_num=${board_num}
mapper.update: update board set views = views+1 where board_num = #{board_num} and board_type_num = 33
